He was best known for founding the Shanghai Tang fashion chain in 1994, which he sold in 1998 to Richemont. Tang's grandfather, Tang Shiu Kin, "founded the Kowloon bus company and became one of Hong Kong's greatest philanthropists"."A Life in the Day: David Tang " The Sunday Times, 20 May 2007. Retrieved 9 July 2011.
